description: Cancels generation of a specified cache report. You can use this operation to manually cancel an IN-PROGRESS report for any reason. This action changes the report status from IN-PROGRESS to CANCELLED. You can only cancel in-progress reports. If the the report you attempt to cancel is in FAILED, ERROR, or COMPLETED state, the cancel operation returns an error.

parameters.name: CacheReportARN
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the cache report you want to cancel.

nested_items.name: CacheReportARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the cache report you want to cancel.
